creator: jwjansen@xs4all.nl
text:
I have defined a local domain (willebil.nl) running on an local dns server. I 
want to use two virtual hosts at ip addr. 10.0.0.141. Therefore i have created 
an config that looks like the example below. When i restart the server and open 
a browser session like http://phpdevelop.willebil.nl then i get the original 
installation version, the same if i use phpnuke.
In the access_log i find the following entries:

10.0.0.151 - - [10/Aug/2003:13:46:21 +0200] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 403 2898 "-
" "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.0; .NET CLR 1.1.4322)"
10.0.0.151 - - [10/Aug/2003:13:46:21 +0200] "GET /icons/apache_pb.gif HTTP/1.1" 
304 0 "http://phpdevelop.willebil.nl/" "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; 
Windows NT 5.0; .NET CLR 1.1.4322)"
10.0.0.151 - - [10/Aug/2003:13:46:21 +0200] "GET /icons/powered_by.gif 
HTTP/1.1" 304 0 "http://phpdevelop.willebil.nl/" "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 
6.0; Windows NT 5.0; .NET CLR 1.1.4322)"

What am i doing wrong?

thx in advance

------------------------------
Listen 80
NameVirtualHost *
<VirtualHost *>
DocumentRoot /var/www/html
ServerName ncc1701.willebil.nl
</VirtualHost>
<VirtualHost *>
DocumentRoot /var/www/phpdevelop
ServerName phpdevelop.willebil.nl
</VirtualHost>
<VirtualHost *>
DocumentRoot "/var/www/phpnuke"
ServerName phpnuke.willebil.nl
</VirtualHost>

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
This is a support question, not a bug report.  Please take such
questions to a support forum like the users@httpd.apache.org mailing
list.  Thanks.

[Hint: your log reports a 403 error, so you have some sort of permissions
problem.]
